Title: Relates to the payment of real property and school district taxes in installments
Summary: Relates to the payment of real property and school district taxes in installments; provides that if a property owner has elected to pay taxes in installments, the statement of taxes shall include the due dates for such payments without interest or penalties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the payment of real property and school district taxes in installments
